name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Four hours ago, the blogger released an uncut video to prove that he had indeed cut the jersey with the signature. I sincerely apologize to this blogger. I am sorry. After getting up this morning, I received screenshots from some netizens. In order to verify, I went to the blogger's account, but I did not see the signature because of the video compression. At the same time, because I had seen many people questioning on Twitter and the blogger's comment area before, I was subjective. I am sorry for the impact of the hasty release of this video on his reputation. I have deleted the original video now, but I will not delete this apology, hoping to recover some of the damage caused to him by my fault.
I need to explain that the picture I used was a screenshot of the video on Douyin, and I did not deliberately use PS to discredit the blogger (otherwise I would not have released the video together.
I apologize again for the trouble caused to this blogger. I am sorry. In the future, I will be more cautious when facing such personal materials.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 8, the media reported that "dragon" is no longer translated as Dragon, nor does it use the Chinese pinyin "Long", but instead uses "Loong" marked by the 19th century British missionary Marshman.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: However, the issue of the gentle and friendly image of the Chinese dragon being unsuitable for translation into the Western word “Dragon” has been discussed for many years. I remember it being discussed when I was in elementary school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Well-known football commentator Yuan Jia denied the news that the Chinese Football Association had suspended cooperation with the Argentine Football Association, but a few hours later confirmed that the two warm-up matches of the Argentine team in China in March had been cancelled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 8, at Luneng Mansion in Yibin, migrant workers still gathered at the construction site late at night to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 6, Tianshui, Gansu. Dongyu Building owed workers wages, and the angry workers could not help but curse at the boss, who threw things at the workers in retaliation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 7, Panjin, Liaoning. Dawa International Medical City owes wages to migrant workers. A large number of workers gathered outside the Panjin Dawa District Supervisory Committee building to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: I wish you all a happy Chinese New Year!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 9, the day of the Lunar New Year, Henan Rural Commercial Bank depositors went to Zhengzhou East Station again to defend their rights

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens contributed Spring Festival couplets from a certain place

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Contribution from Bank of Communications employees
This year’s new employees were not able to receive the same year-end bonus as previous years’ new employees. They were only given a symbolic amount of several hundred yuan as year-end bonus without any explanation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 9, Henan Bank depositors were blocked by "men in black" on a high-speed train. The depositors shouted at the "men in black": You are Henan, China, not southern Myanmar.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After getting off the bus, the depositors were immediately surrounded by "men in black"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, these depositors have lost contact again in Zhengzhou

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 9, a man was unable to withdraw money from Zhongyuan Bank. His mother was in hospital and needed money urgently, so the man broke down and cried.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At 8:30 on New Year's Eve, in a certain place in Hunan, special police went to the streets to confiscate fireworks

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Just now, the Hangzhou Sports Bureau issued a statement announcing the cancellation of the Argentina team's friendly match originally scheduled for March "in view of currently well-known reasons."
